Do you want to split it to multiple shorter lines ?
cc @Amanieu
I don't mind if you do, but you don't have to.

just asking you to open an E-easy issue for contributors.
It is kinda easy, using fold unix command and with a bit of reformatting after that.
Using a single line per sentence instead of wrapping at a fixed length improves diffs a lot.
Agreed on that part. But editor and diff on terminal doesn't like long lines.
Maybe do both? Wrap each sentence to a fixed length, but don't put parts of multiple sentences on the same line.
